publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1206# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Abercorn Primary School West Lothian—That the Parliament registers its concern about the possible closure of Abercorn Primary School in West Lothian which provides a first class education to its pupils, notes the opposition expressed by the parents to the proposed closure by West Lothian Council and calls upon the Council to keep the school open. Supported by: David McLetchie*
S1M-1206# Abercorn Primary School West Lothian (lodged on 22 September 2000) Alex Johnstone*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Keith Harding*, David Mundell*
S1M-1206# Abercorn Primary School West Lothian (lodged on 22 September 2000) Fiona Hyslop*, John Scott*

Supported by: David McLetchie, Alex Johnstone, Alex Fergusson, Mr Keith Harding, David Mundell, Fiona Hyslop, John Scott, Nick Johnston*
S1M-1206# Abercorn Primary School West Lothian (lodged on 22 September 2000) Bill Aitken*
